data.text: Then Job replied,
“Listen to what I say, all three of you;
Be patient with me, and allow me to speak.
“It is certainly not [RHQ] people against whom I am complaining, but God
Look at me! Does what you see not cause you to be appalled
When I think about what has happened to me,
“But let me ask this: ‘Why do wicked people continue to live,
They have their children around them,
Wicked people live in their own houses without being afraid,
Their bulls always mate with the cows successfully,
Wicked people send their young children outside to play,
Some children dance and sing, while others shake tambourines and play lyres,
Wicked people enjoy having good things all the time that they are alive,
While they are alive, they say to God, ‘Do not bother us;
Why do you, Almighty God, think that we should serve you?
Think about it: Wicked people think that it is because of what they have done that they have become prosperous,
◄“How often does it happen that wicked people die [MET] before they are old?/Very seldom do wicked people die [MET] before they are old.► [RHQ]
He does not blow them away like wind blows away straw;
You say, ‘When people have committed sins,
I hope/wish that wicked people will experience themselves being destroyed,
After wicked people are dead,
“Since God judges everyone, even those that are in heaven,
Some people die while they are very healthy,
Their bodies are fat;
Other people die being very miserable;
But both rich and poor people die and are buried,
“Listen, I know what you three are thinking.
You say, ‘What happened to the tents in which wicked people were living?
But have you never inquired of people who travel much?
that wicked people usually do not suffer at the time when there are great disasters;
There is no one [RHQ] who accuses wicked people,
The corpses of wicked people are carried to their graves,
A huge number [HYP] of people go to the grave site.
“So how can you console me by talking nonsense?
